CustomField.formula: OR(IF( ISBLANK($User.COMM_EffectiveAccountId__c), $User.COMM_AccountId__c = Account.Id && CONTAINS($User.COMM_ContactAirports__c, TEXT(Product.COMM_Airport__c)), CONTAINS($User.COMM_EffectiveAccountId__c,Account.Id) && CONTAINS($User.COMM_ContactAirports__c, TEXT(Product.COMM_Airport__c))), OR($UserRole.DeveloperName ='COMM_ANA_Admin',$UserRole.DeveloperName ='COMM_Platform_Administrator',$UserRole.DeveloperName ='COMM_SABA'))
CustomField.label: Check Partner Visibility
